question: Display documentaries and short films with a budget of $500,000.
sql_query1:
SELECT Documentaries.title
FROM Documentaries
WHERE Documentaries.Budget = "500000"
UNION
SELECT ShortFilms.title
FROM ShortFilms
WHERE ShortFilms.Budget = "500000"
sql_query2:
SELECT Documentaries.title
FROM Documentaries
UNION
SELECT ShortFilms.title
FROM ShortFilms
WHERE ShortFilms.Budget = "500000"
interpretation1: What documentaries and short films have a budget of $500,000?
interpretation2: List all documentaries and also display short films with a budget of $500,000.
